title: Progressive Radio News Hour
content:
Guests: Mahdi Nazemroaya and Bruce Gagnon Nazemroaya is a Middle East/Central Asian analyst and Research Associate for... <!--more--> the Center for Research on Globalization.
Since June, he and other independent journalists reported truthfully on NATO’s Libya war, putting themselves at great risk doing it.
He’ll discuss what he saw firsthand.
Gagnon is co-founder and coordinator of the Global Network Against Weapons and Nuclear Power in Space.

He’s also provided extensive coverage of America’s plan for a greater Asian footprint on Jeju Island, South Korea.
It’s effect and implication for the region, island, and its residents will be discussed.
